ValidationRule.description: Account fields required when closing an Onboarding Case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.Org_Wide_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c = false, ISCHANGED(Status), Text(Status) = 'Closed', TEXT(Closed_Reason__c) = 'Onboarded', OR( ISBLANK( Account.c2g__CODAAccountTradingCurrency__c ), ISBLANK( Account.c2g__CODAInvoiceEmail__c ), ISBLANK( TEXT(Account.c2g__CODAVATStatus__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure you've updated the Account Information before finalising this Onboarding: Invoice Email, Tax Status and Account Trading Currency
